pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate a Penalized Linear Model using the CDF Penalty Function // Utilize the CDF penalty function to estimate a penalized linear model. It enables you to display some graphical representations and determine whether the Karush-Kuhn-Tucker conditions are met. For more details about the theory, please refer to Cuntrera, D., Augugliaro, L., Muggeo, V. M. (2022) arXiv:2212.08582.
